item.title: Introduction to Self Supervised Learning
item.description: Self-supervised learning can sound like a real mouthful! My family and friends have asked me many times what it is I actually do for my master’s degree, and I always struggled to come up with a simple answer; an answer that really captures the idea without getting too technical. In this post I would like to try to do just that. We’ll start by defining what supervised learning is, since self-supervised learning tries to work around the main limitations of supervised learning.
